resources.string: Place your finger on the camera
Please keep still and try again
Please enter the measured blood pressure and heart rate
Please rate the app by selecting how much you agree or disagree with each statement.
The app was straight forward to use.
I had very little trouble taking my blood pressure measurement.
I feel that I would require technical assistance to use this app.
If it were available, I would personally use an app like this.
This is completely optional. These details will only be used to provide feedback regarding the study results and publications, and will not be shared with anyone.
